content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dludemy.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@dludemy.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@dludemy.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
                ) WITH (
                    location_id SMALLINT 1, 
                    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
                    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
                    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
                ) AS [result]
